channel.title: Help me with 1 quick problem:
channel.description: I am making a right-click-ipban thing for my server and it all works but it also lags me out. Can anyone tell me how to fix this. I will attempt to try but it'd be great if i could get backup help. Thanks! :D

item.title: Help me with 1 quick problem:
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

For the actual ipban code its:

case 39: if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ghostly")) { { int index = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client nub = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; if(index != -1) { appendToBanned(nub.playerLastConnect); nub.disconnected = true; sM("You have ipbanned "+nub.playerName+"."); } } }
and the context menu item

if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ghostly")) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("@lre@Ipban"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

EDIT:
Is there anything else I should add to the case 39 so it don’t lag me out?

Read full topic
